step_feedback.feedback: Good start! Keep your arms relaxed and fingers open as you prepare to move overhead.
Great job stretching your arms overhead with fingers open. Focus on a smooth transition into the next movement.
Well done making a fist and squeezing your shoulder blades together. Remember to inhale and tighten your muscles during this phase.
Excellent! You're stretching your arms back overhead and exhaling. Keep the movement controlled as you relax.
Good job completing the first repetition. Ensure you are fully relaxing and preparing for the next set.
You're starting the second rep well. Remember to keep your arms relaxed and fingers open as you reach overhead.
Good stretch overhead with open fingers. Focus on a smooth and controlled movement into the next step.
Nicely done making a fist and squeezing your shoulder blades. Remember to inhale and engage your muscles.
Great job extending your arms overhead and exhaling. Keep the relaxation phase smooth and controlled.
You've finished the exercise! Ensure you are fully relaxed now. Great effort today!

exercise_summary: You did a great job with the Push Down Pumping exercise! Remember to keep your fingers open when stretching overhead and squeeze your shoulder blades together as you make a fist. Focus on smooth, controlled movements throughout the exercise.
